duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage daily operations of systems integrations between eCommerce, ERPs, and digital solutions.
Lead or support major Digital/IT projects for the business, including reviewing IT processes and improving systems communication.
Provide support for system integration issues between disparate systems.
Collaborate with business partners and Central IS&T to develop roadmaps and drive projects.
Ensure alignment and prioritize Digital/Ecomm/Omni development projects.
Organize system changes, conduct product demo sessions, and define KPIs.
Mitigate risks and establish an escalation process for project blockers.
Oversee architectural design and support users in the Omni/Ecommerce scope.
Provide L2 and L3 support for applications, identifying opportunities for improvement.
Lead cost efficiency initiatives and engage with Digital/Omni communities.
Utilize project management, communication, and technical skills to excel.
Internal contacts with Head Offices users, Store Managers, US Client Services, the business's CIOs, and E-commerce/Digital business teams.
External contacts with 3rd party local suppliers, warehouse partners, and US IS vendors (SFCC Consultants).
